overview: Live concert released in 1995/09/30, with notable hits of Hironobu Kageyama at the time, like Dragon Ball Z songs CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA and WE GOTTA POWER  01-Kishin Doji ZENKI  02-Muteki no Kishin  03-Do! Challenge  04-Kokoro wa Tamago  05-Casshern ~fū no bohyō~  06-Hikari no Tabi (with KUKO)  07-CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA  08-WE GOTTA POWER  09-WE ARE REYSOL  10-Hikari no Kodomo  11-Marugoto  12-TIME ~2036no sentaku~ (with Mitsuko Horie)
title: HIRONOBU KAGEYAMA POWER LIVE'95 CYVOX
